provisions.title: Employee Non-Solicitation
provisions.baseline: During the Term and for twelve (12) months thereafter, neither party will, directly or indirectly, solicit for employment any executive-level employee of the other party with whom it had contact in connection with this Agreement. General solicitations not specifically targeted do not violate this section.

provisions.title: Confidential Information Carve-Outs
provisions.baseline: Confidential Information does not include information that is (a) publicly available without breach, (b) already known without restriction, (c) independently developed without use of the discloserâ€™s Confidential Information, or (d) rightfully received from a third party without duty of confidentiality.

provisions.title: Affiliate Language
provisions.baseline: References to a party include its Affiliates solely as necessary for performance; obligations shall not be unreasonably broadened by Affiliate definitions.
